message: This offer heavily favors me, but it's the first round.  The value decreases significantly for you if we wait, Bob.
This is a fair starting point.  We can negotiate further, but the value of the money decreases rapidly for me with each passing round.
I'm aiming for a more equitable split this time, Bob. Consider the decreasing value for you as we progress.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me. The value is decreasing quickly, and I can't afford to wait much longer.
